#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,a[]={0,3,6,6,28,28,36,36,36,120,120,120,120,120,120,120,300,300,528,528,630,630,630,630,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,2016,3240,3240,3240,3240,5460,5460,5460,5460,5460,5460,5460,5460,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,25200,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920,73920};
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    	cin>>n;
    	cout<<a[n]<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
